You become immune to inability effects, your Attack Speed gets slowed down by half and you cannot attack together or counterattack while playing the song.

description: Plays a song that increases the Attack Bar of all allies, excluding yourself, by 15% each and then recovers the HP of the ally that gets a turn by 15% each and increases the Attack Power for 1 turn until the next turn starts. description: Revives with 30% HP when you're defeated and then falls under the Thunderer state for 3 turns. If the incoming damage is less than 10% of your MAX HP, the duration of the Thunderer state increases by 1 turn. [Automatic Effect]

name: Chain Effect (Passive)

[Automatic Effect]

name: Might  Thunder (Passive)

description: Becomes enraged whenever an enemy gets a turn and the skill will activate automatically when enraged 12 times. Removes all beneficial effects and attacks all enemies to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. Recovers the HP in proportion to the number of removed beneficial effects. This attack will also stun all enemies and permanently increase the Boss's Attack Power.

name: Rageful Roar
description: Becomes enraged whenever an enemy gets a turn and the skill will activate automatically when enraged 12 times. Removes all beneficial effects and attacks all enemies to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. Recovers the HP in proportion to the number of removed beneficial effects. This attack will also stun all enemies and permanently increase the Boss's Attack Power.

name: Rageful Roar
description: Becomes enraged whenever an enemy gets a turn and the skill will activate automatically when enraged 12 times. Removes all beneficial effects and attacks all enemies to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. Recovers the HP in proportion to the number of removed beneficial effects. This attack will also stun all enemies and permanently increase the Boss's Attack Power.

name: Total Annihilation
description: Attacks all party members when the boss loses 50% of the HP, ignoring all incoming damage. All harmful effects will be removed and the boss's stats will substantially increase when this skill is activated. Crush of Doom and Breath of Doom will gain 2 more hits when Total Annihilation is activated.

name: Carnage
description: When the boss eliminates an entire team of Monsters, the boss's attack speed will increase and will start attacking all of the nearby enemies.

name: Destroyer's Revenge(Passive)
description: Increases the damage of the next attack in proportion to the number of turns enemies gain. The attack won't land as a Glancing Hit, and the damage boost resets after the attack.

name: Ruler of Chaos(Passive)
description: The 3 heads of the boss will share the Attack Bar at the start of the battle using its chaotic strength. Also, the boss will mitigate HP proportionate damage it receives by sharing a single HP among the 3 heads.

name: Rectifier of All Things
description: Attacks all enemies to decrease their Defense for 2 turns.

name: Ancient Disaster
description: Attacks all enemies 5 times. Each hit steals 1 beneficial effect with a 50% chance.

name: Devil Gene's Origin (Passive)
description: Increases the boss's Defense for 2 turns at the start of its turn and gains immunity against Attack Bar decreasing effects. [Automatic Effect]

name: Ancient Demon (Passive)
description: At the start of its turn, creates a shield equal to 5% of the boss's MAX HP for 2 turns for each beneficial effect granted on the boss. [Automatic Effect]

name: Omega Crash
description: Attacks the enemy 4 times. Each of the first 3 hits removes 1 beneficial effect, and the last hit stuns for 1 turn with a 30% chance.

name: Demonic Catastrophe
description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. The first hit decreases their Attack Speed for 2 turns, and the second hit stuns for 1 turn.

name: Devil Gene (Passive)
description: Increases the boss's Attack Power for 2 turns at the start of its turn and gains immunity against Attack Bar decreasing effects. [Automatic Effect]

name: Mishima Style Fighting Karate (Passive)
description: Counterattacks the enemy with a 30% chance when attacked by an enemy with no beneficial effects. [Automatic Effect]

name: Dark Vortex
description: Attacks all enemies. The damage dealt increases by 20% for each harmful effect granted on the target.

name: Demon's Retribution
description: Attacks all enemies 6 times. Each of the first 5 hits replaces 1 beneficial effect granted on them with Continuous Damage for 2 turns with a 30% chance, and the last hit blocks them from removing harmful effects for 2 turns.

name: Devil Gene Awakening (Passive)
description: Increases the boss's Attack Power and Defense for 2 turns at the start of its turn and gains immunity against Attack Bar decreasing effects. [Automatic Effect]

name: Absolute Demon (Passive)
description: When the boss is attacked, inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns to the enemy that attacked the boss. [Automatic Effect]
